description:
At Allegra-Law in Albuquerque, New Mexico, we are fully committed to helping you and your family through what is likely one of the worst times in your life.

Backed by more than 25 years of successful trial experience, Ms. Carpenter established our law firm as a way to better serve the residents of our community. A highly rated personal injury attorney and a recognized leader in graphic evidence and trial presentations, Ms. Carpenter has advocated on behalf of thousands of clients over the course of her career, securing substantial settlements and awards for the damages they incurred as the result of any of the following:

  • Nursing home neglect and abuse
  • Medical malpractice
  • Automobile and commercial truck accidents
  • Uber and rideshare accidents
  • Other types of preventable tragedies

Ms. Carpenter's unwavering devotion to those she serves has earned her the respect of her clients and peers alike, and she is AV-Preeminent peer-review rated* through Martindale-Hubbell. In addition, she has also received recognition from Best Lawyers in America as one of the top personal injury attorneys in the region for the past 10 years, including the "Lawyer of the Year" award in 2015.

To receive a free initial consultation concerning your claim from a local attorney you can trust, you can contact Allegra-Law to schedule an appointment.
